short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to display user trust rating and AI linguistic analysis labels for news article pages. From idoubt.news site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your news reading experience with the I Doubt News Chrome extension. Get AI-powered linguistic analysis to identify manipulative techniques in news articles, helping you make informed decisions about their trustworthiness. Join the fight against dishonest media and promote transparent information sharing. Learn more at idoubt.news.
